title: Windows 7 Loader v1.8.4 by Daz~DiBYA
description:
About:
This is the loader application thats used by millions of people worldwide,
well known for passing Microsoft's WAT (Windows Activation Technologies) and is arguably the safest Windows activation exploit ever created.
The application itself injects a SLIC (Software Licensing Description Table) into your system before Windows boots,
this is what fools Windows into thinking it's genuine.

The rundown
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢This will run on x86 and x64 systems
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢This can activate all Windows versions at the same time, just install it on each
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢No core system files get modified
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢No extra processes are run so you have nothing eating at your RAM
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢All key parts of the exploit are encrypted with a custom encryption
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢The exploit runs before Windows so it's harder for Microsoft to prevent
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢The exploit patches all necessary tables making activation look authentic
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢The application will select the best profile for your system during installation
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Each and every user has a unique version of the exploit installed on his/her system

Application integrity checking?
Hover your mouse over the green, amber or red icon to see detailed application information.

Extra information
Do I need to update ?
If you have installed a version and you're activated then you shouldn't need to update.
If however you are like me and you like to use the latest and the best versions of software then updating shouldn't be a problem.

Using a BIE release or another activation solution ?
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Launch the loader application and select to uninstall ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ This is important

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Install the loader and restart the PC
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Visit the following website to revalidate Windows: www.microsoft.com/genuine/ (You might need to use IE8)

How can I convert from RemoveWAT to this loader ?
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Uninstall RemoveWAT
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Download and run FixWAT (Cleans up things RemoveWAT doesn't restore. This will restart your PC)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Install the loader
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Visit the following website to revalidate Windows: www.microsoft.com/genuine/ (You might need to use IE8)

Help, my system won't boot !
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Boot up the PC from your Windows installation disk
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Select the "Repair your computer" option
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Select "Command Prompt"
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Input "bootsect.exe /nt60 SYS /force" (Without quotes)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Restart the PC

Version 1.8.4 changes (06/19/2010):
* Added a new GRLDR version (Calculates the EBDA end 256 bytes lower)
* Added the ability to give the SLIC a custom position (Useful if SLIC emulation fails under the default options)
* Added Olidata SLIC, certficiate and serial

Extra information
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions for Use
If you have NO SLIC 2.1 in BIOS (which unless you flashed with a modded BIOS, you Probably do not have SLIC 2.1)
1. Install windows 7 (DON'T Enter a Serial During Installation).
2. Run this as Administrator.
3. Click on Profile. (Optional)
4. Choose Matching SLIC and Certificate (Dell, MSI, etc) (Optional)
5. Choose Serial (Serial Must match Your version of Win 7) (Optional)
6. Click on the install button. (under Activation options)
7. Wait for Loader to Work and Reboot.
Enjoy !!!!
